评论概述: Perfect dress for my sister in laws wedding
评论详情: She felt and looked beautiful she said it felt like good quality and she looks like a bride 10/10 and it shipped right on time for her last minute wedding we ordered on Monday and it came on Thursday the same week! For reference she for a XXL and she is 5’5

This is just a bit big in the chest area for me but it’s still quite flattering on. (For reference I’m a 38C and ordered size XL.) It has a forgiving cut, shape and seams for someone like me who has developed a little extra weight in the tummy and hips. It’s soft and has a nice flow to it. I added a belt as I feel it needed that little extra touch and overall I’m happy with this dress.

This dress is really cute. I love that the v-neck is sewn together, so there are no gaps. However, I do not have enough up top to make it look good. I'm sure that someone who is more well-endowed would look beautiful in it. I'm not a huge fan of the feeling of lace, but it's not itchy or hard like some lace. The fabric underneath is very swishy and comfortable.

I picked this up for my girlfriend (I love how she looks in dresses) and while the dress fit just fine it looked very odd once worn. It looks like it was not made to hug the correct areas that make a dress look pretty. It was nicely made and the material was soft and looked nice under the light with a lot of detail so it was very odd to me that it did not retain it's beauty once worn. The cut was just off in too many places to redeem. For the price you want something useful and not some "knock around the house" garment. It's not a bad dress at all but if you are going for a classic dress fit you may want to think twice about picking this one up.
Fit as expected and looks great!

评论概述: Pretty Design, but Quality Could Be Better
评论详情: I ordered this dress in XXL Green, and for reference, I’m 190 lbs and 5'3". The fit is mostly okay, though it does feel a little snug in the chest area. The overall design is nice, and I especially like the waterfall effect in the front—it’s very flattering and gives the dress a touch of elegance.  The quality of the lace, however, is disappointing. It feels scratchy and not as soft as I’d hoped. That said, the dress does have a lining, which makes it more comfortable to wear despite the lace’s texture. I’ve washed it once, and it seemed to hold up fine, which is a relief.  It’s a decent option if you’re looking for an affordable formal dress, but don’t expect high-end materials. The design is lovely, but the fabric quality could use improvement.
Good price. Quality is good.  Light weight

This was a disappointment. The top doesn't lay right and is too tight across the chest. Too short in the top as well so the waist is too high and hits me just under the bust. the dress is unflattering, usually a wrap dress is very flattering on me. This dress pulls in weird ways, is uncomfortable, and non comfortable on. It's like the dress was designed for someone small and simply made wider instead of adjusting the fit for plus size bodies. Unfortunately I see this a lot in plus size clothes. There are much better options out there at a similar or even better price.
The dress is really pretty.  Fit perfectly.

It's not bad looking and size is probably accurate.  The lace fabric is very soft and not scratchy at all.  The lining feels cheap and gets static clingy very easily.  Dress is ok, but seems overpriced.  I wouldn't recommend for black tie events, it's a dress that can be worn in casual setting as well.

I am a 2x, I ordered the 1x after reading some reviews saying it runs large, and it fits me perfect.  However, the way they fastened the chest is SO weird.  It's like loose fabric and then they tacked it together with a small bit of thread, which causes the chest to pucker and fit very badly.  I used a seam ripper to remove that bad stitching and repined it in a lower position, which helped but didn't fix the issue completely as there is just SO much fabric on the chest.  I have J cups and this was still too odd fitting and big in the chest for me.

This dress is very true to size! I love this dress and how beautiful it is. The quality of the material is very well made. This is elegant and perfect for any type of formal party. You will not be disappointed in this beautiful dress.

Comfortable lined lace dress I probably could've gone down a size from the size chart because it really goes by your chest measurement not your stomach measurement. The sleeves are comfortable. They hide some flaws without being stuck all up in your armpits, which I can't stand, if I'm not comfortable I will sweat and just be in a bad mood. The top is flattering and will cover any "assets" nicely and fully cover any shape-wear and bra straps. I wish there was a little bit more elastic at the Empire waste. I will probably dress it up with a pin where the ruffle starts It is a good length,  lace dresses that I've worn in the past have gotten caught on heels, but this is long enough to cover the legs and look formal but short enough where it doesn't , get caught on heels or the ankle buckles on the straps.

评论概述: Cute but runs a little small
评论详情: This is a chic black lacey dress, that looks really cute on me. But it does feel like it runs a little bit smaller than other amazon dresses I have tried. The fabric also gets VERY staticky, which isn't great for the upcoming colder weather. But other than that, I like it a lot and it's flattering. It is a little snug in the chest, and the waistband is tighter than I expected, but it still fits. It's just not as loose or as comfortable as I thought it would be. I'd suggest sizing up if you're at the top part of a size's measurements.

I usually go between a 2x-3x depending on the place and, based on other reviews of this running small, I went with the 3x.  This was the correct move on my part as it turned out to be the perfect fit--not too loose or too tight.  V-necks worry me because they never seem to fit me right, but this one surprisingly did!  The material is a little stretchy which makes it easy to put on.  I had no issues.  The fabric against the body is comfortable.  It's a beautiful dress that I plan to wear for Christmas.

This dress is fairly standard, and the design is charming. The flap at the top is stitched down in one spot to provide modesty, or you can pick it apart to put your own pin in. The material has good stretch and fit decently well on me. My main complaint is that it is ever so slightly see-through. Admittedly I was wearing dark undergarments when I tried it on, and really looking hard to see if I could make them out. I could see the dark part but not make out the shape clearly. I’m not sure if it would be more noticeable outside since I tried it on indoors. With a slip it would likely be fine.
Love this dress. Fit perfect, very comfortable. I wore to a wedding and got tons of compliments!  Highly recommend!

This dress is so comfortable, I was werid the fabric was going to be itchy but it instead is the softest I have ever felt. The design of the dress makes it super flattering on as it hugs the waist and flows elsewhere. This is a decent dress for the price and I highly recommend it.
dress came with no tags and smelled like body odor

This truly is a beautiful dress and I love the style. The fit though was a different story. I’m 5’11 / 250lbs and am a 2x in general. I ordered a 3x to be on the safe side and that was a joke…it definitely runs small. For me anyways. I barely squeezed into it and everything from the chest, armholes, waistline, etc was all wrong and awkward. Which is a bummer because I love the dress itself.
Very comfortable material fits me perfectly nice flowy feeling. Love the lace beautiful dress ❤️❤️
Fits true to size, the material is light and has a flowy drape. I just feel beautiful in it.

I usually order a size up because I’m bigger chested. This was still small on me. Along with it being small, the armpits came down really low causing my bra to show. This went back due to this. Also the quality was ok but didn’t feel like a great dress to be in. Lots of static

评论概述: Don't even try if you aren't plus sized
评论详情: Since the model (based on the dimensions listed) wasn't even the smallest size on the size chart I thought that maybe I could get away with the 1x as a party dress.  I was quite disappointed.  Keep in mind that you definitely need a fuller chest for this dress to work the best for you.  In theory I liked the detail, but the whole thing just ended up looking a bit frumpy.
This dress is a very nice lace. It's comfortable to wear. It looks amazing!!! Fits true to size. Perfect to wear to a wedding, tea or formal event in Spring or Summer. 12/10
This dress is supposed to be plus sized bet fits my 5'3" 145lb frame well. Its really soft and comfortable. Its very fashionable and suitable for a formal event or a casual night out on the town!
